mapper.select: select authorId as id,authorNickName,fans,attention,(select sum(readNum) from cnblog_blog where authorId=id) as readSum from cnblog_author order by fans desc limit #{limit};

select cnblog_author.authorId as id,authorNickName,fans,attention,sum(readNum) as readSum from cnblog_author,cnblog_blog where cnblog_author.authorId=cnblog_blog.authorId group by cnblog_author.authorId order by readSum desc limit #{limit};
select count(*) from cnblog_author where createDate>#{0} and createDate<#{1}
select title,tag,type,readNum from cnblog_blog where authorId=#{id}
select count(*) from cnblog_blog where publish>#{0} and publish<#{1}
select sum(readNum) from cnblog_blog where publish>#{0} and publish<#{1}
